body_html:
Hi @skye and @naatje80 I got the same issue. After installing tensorflow 1.0.1 from source, using bazel 0.4.5, I no longer get the error. Used keras v2 with MNIST dataset, it took 799s using the terminal. (GeForce 1070)

For some reason, when I use jupyter notebook, it gets blocked. From terminal using py files, everything works ok

body:
Hi @skye and @naatje80 I got the same issue. After installing tensorflow 1.0.1 from source, using bazel 0.4.5, I no longer get the error. Used keras v2 with MNIST dataset, it took 799s using the terminal. (GeForce 1070)

For some reason, when I use jupyter notebook, it gets blocked. From terminal using py files, everything works ok
